original: A medley of haunting chants and pan-pipe melodies that loop the subliminal message: "All life contains innate intelligence - lose yours by cracking your joints. Credit cards accepted."
translated: 魔性的旋律和排箫的曲调，循环播放着潜意识信息：「万物皆有智慧——在关节的咔咔响声中失去理智吧。接受信用卡支付。」

original: The neck can support more than the head!
translated: 脖子能支撑的不只是头！

original: Ever watched an adult film? Remember, chiropractic medicine is first and foremost a business. We will teach you the top ten secrets to high patient volume. Get 'em in, pop the neck, slap the ass and collect the cash!
translated: 看过成人片吗？记住，推拿治疗首先是一门生意。我们会告诉你获得高门诊量的十大秘诀。把人弄进来，脖子咔咔造，屁股啪啪打，钞票哗哗收！

original: Our guide to tacky advertising and sensationalist promotions.
translated: 利用情感让你的广告推销平易近人。

original: The cornerstone of a successful chiropractic business! How to set up an insurance mill. Staging a phony road accident. Essential paperwork to bolster an insurance claim. Employing runners to recruit accident victims. Unneeded back braces. False billing. How to pop a penis. The goal of a chiropractor is to maximize medical expenses. You will not last long in this business if you rely on treatment alone.
translated: 推拿生意成功的基石！手把手教学如何骗保。伪造交通事故、出具证明提高索赔可信度、雇佣下线替你招募事故受害人、推销用不到的腰托、伪造账单、鸡巴推拿的手法。推拿师的最终目标是最大化患者的医疗开支。这行光靠手法治疗是走不远的。

original: Exclusive access to our database of 'control studies'
translated: 「对照研究」数据库的独家访问权

original: A series of bogus tests conducted by creepy hippies from Vermont. These studies will silence any objector who dares to doubt the effectiveness of an ex-con messing around in their nervous system!
translated: 由佛蒙特州的可怕嬉皮士捏造的检测结果。有人怀疑前科犯乱搞神经系统的疗效？用这些数据堵住他们的嘴！
一大堆没营养的电子问卷

original: A 'Virtually Vertebrae' Teddy Bear for you to practice on
translated: 拥有「仿真脊椎」的练习用泰迪熊

original: The kids will love it too!
How to get out of being accused of being a pedo
A pack of anti-vaccination propaganda pamphlets
translated: 反疫苗宣传的全套小册子
